revised_title: K-Partitions of R-Gon and R-Ace: A Study on Reversible and Irreversible Configurations
tldr: The author investigates k-partitions of r-gons and r-aces, focusing on reversible and irreversible configurations, and their relationship with axes of reversion. The study includes theorems on the number of axes, their types, and the properties of these partitions in relation to symmetry and geometry.
